eu.amidst.core.inference

Class MAPInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.MAPInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class MAPInference
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the MAP Inference algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • setParallelMode

        public void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode_)
        Sets the parallel mode for this InferenceAlgorithm. Note that this method is only implemented for the inference algorithms that can be run in parallel.
        Specified by:
        setParallelMode in interface InferenceAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        parallelMode_ - a boolean that indicates whether this InferenceAlgorithm can be run in parallel (i.e., true) or not (i.e., false).
